arts.ttl: Inside Mikel Arteta's love affair with Real Sociedad: Arsenal's manager grew up supporting the Spanish club - and is he recreating their 2019-20 side with the addition of Martin Zubimendi?
arts.sum: Arsenal are set to sign Martin Zubimendi in the summer and the transfer will mark the latest chapter in Mikel Arteta's lifelong love affair with Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Copa del Rey round-up: Holders Athletic Club knocked out, Real Sociedad secure progression
arts.sum: The last 16 of the Copa del Rey concluded on Thursday with three more matches: holders Athletic Club hosted Osasuna, Real Sociedad took on Rayo Vallecano, while Real Madrid faced Celta Vigo in the late kick-off. arts.ttl: Bayern Munich remain interested in Martin Zubimendi due to Kimmich’s contract situation
arts.sum: Bayern Munich have continued their interest in signing Martin Zubimendi from La Liga side Real Sociedad due to Joshua Kimmich’s future remaining unresolved. Kimmich’s contract with Bayern Munich ends in…

arts.ttl: Arsenal transfer news: Martin Zubimendi 'monitored' by European quartet despite 'virtually completed' summer deal
arts.sum: Arsenal could reportedly face competition from four European giants for the signature of Real Sociedad's Martin Zubimendi, even though a deal for the midfielder to move to North London is said to be 'virtually completed'.

arts.ttl: ‘I was told’: How Liverpool actually feel towards Martin Zubimendi after summer rejection – journalist
arts.sum: Liverpool are having the most remarkable season under Arne Slot. The Reds are top of the Premier League and top of the Champions League, and...

arts.ttl: EXCLUSIVE: Martin Zubimendi agrees Arsenal contract with huge wage increase
arts.sum: Arsenal have agreed personal terms with Real Sociedad midfielder Martin Zubimendi, though FootballTransfers understands there is still a slight sticking point that could yet block a deal for the Spain international. FootballTransfers has been informed that leaving his boyhood club and San Sebastian in the Basque region is a major emotional decision for Zubimendi, who proved this in the summer as he turned down approaches from Liverpool and Arsenal following Euro 2024.

arts.ttl: ‘Really careful’: Fabrizio Romano shares why he can’t say Martin Zubimendi to Arsenal is done yet

arts.ttl: Arsenal may not have clear run for Martin Zubimendi as four clubs remain keen - journalist
arts.sum: Arsenal have made significant progress in pursuit of Real Sociedad’s Martin Zubimendi in recent days. Earlier this week, sources informed TBR Football that Arsenal are confident of signing...

arts.ttl: Rayo Vallecano manager blames himself for James Rodriguez exit
arts.sum: Earlier this month, James Rodriguez ended his horror five-month spell back in La Liga as he agreed to terminate his Rayo Vallecano contract. In total, the former Real Madrid man made just seven appearances across all competitions for the Vallecas-based side, and he has since joined Club Leon in Mexico. arts.ttl: Arsenal's two big concerns over Mikel Merino emerge amid Martin Zubimendi transfer chase
arts.sum: Arsenal are looking to add more reinforcement to their midfield with the signing of Martin Zubimendi having already added Mikel Merino to their squad during he summer transfer window
